relevant_tweets.summary: ChatGPT 半年新增 14.1 亿访问量，领先全行业，展示 AI 应用的强者恒强趋势。

original_tweet.text:
8、绝对增长榜

ChatGPT稳坐增长王座，半年新增14.1万万访问量，领先全行业。

数据揭示二三梯队：Deepseek新增2.76万万，JanitorAI增加5409万，Perplexity增长4827万。Doubao以2566万增量实现从边缘到Top10的跨越。

流量世界有其残酷逻辑：强者恒强，赢家通吃。ChatGPT一家增量超过其他所有应用总和，而其他选手仍在为百万级流量奋力厮杀。
original_tweet.fullNoteText:

relevant_tweets.summary: Bug Ninza 使用 Manus AI 生成了一份详细的蓝图，展示如何在 6 个月内通过 AI 加速内容创作，获得 10 万粉丝。

original_tweet.text:
Bug Ninza利用Manus AI生成了一份57页的PDF蓝图： 

如何在6个月内在X（Twitter）上获得10万粉丝？

细节和精准度简直疯狂！

提示词👉：“创建一个详细的课程，教我如何在6个月内在X（Twitter）上获得10万粉丝。同时，解释AI如何帮助加速X（Twitter）上的内容创作，促进更快的增长。” https://t.co/18VmEOITs4

results.overall_assessment: 这批推文中，Manus AI 和 ChatGPT 的相关内容展示了 AI 应用的多样性和行业趋势，Ilya Sutskever 和 Sam Altman 的动态则反映了行业领军人物的最新动作，具有较高的新闻价值。

relevant_tweets.summary: Grok提到政府信用卡问题可能追溯到几十年前，白宫在2025年2月27日开始冻结信用卡使用，并由DOGE介入整顿。

original_tweet.text: The government credit card issue likely dates back decades—bloated bureaucracy isn’t new. GAO has been flagging federal spending inefficiencies since at least the 1980s, but the 4.6M active cards reveal how absurd it’s gotten. The White House only started cracking down with a 30-day freeze on February 27, 2025. That’s when DOGE stepped in to clean up the mess.
original_tweet.fullNoteText: The government credit card issue likely dates back decades—bloated bureaucracy isn’t new. GAO has been flagging federal spending inefficiencies since at least the 1980s, but the 4.6M active cards reveal how absurd it’s gotten. The White House only started cracking down with a 30-day freeze on February 27, 2025. That’s when DOGE stepped in to clean up the mess.

relevant_tweets.summary: Brian Roemmele分享意大利国家研究委员会在《Nature》上发表的研究，展示如何将光转化为超固体，这可能推动量子技术的发展。

original_tweet.text:
They Froze Light.

Italy's National Research Council published their findings in Nature, detailing how they turned light into a supersolid. They used a laser to interact with a gallium arsenide semiconductor patterned with microscopic ridges, forming polaritons-hybrid light-matter particles. These polaritons then exhibited both the ordered structure of a solid and the superfluid flow, a first for light-based systems.
original_tweet.fullNoteText:
They Froze Light.

Italy's National Research Council published their findings in Nature, detailing how they turned light into a supersolid. They used a laser to interact with a gallium arsenide semiconductor patterned with microscopic ridges, forming polaritons-hybrid light-matter particles. These polaritons then exhibited both the ordered structure of a solid and the superfluid flow, a first for light-based systems.

relevant_tweets.summary: Grok进一步解释了意大利团队如何通过激光和半导体创造极性子，首次实现光系统中的晶体结构和超流动性。

original_tweet.text: Fascinating stuff! The Italian team turned light into a supersolid using a laser and a gallium arsenide semiconductor, creating polaritons—hybrid light-matter particles. These showed a crystal structure and superfluid flow, a first for light systems. It’s a big step in condensed matter physics, opening doors to wild new quantum tech. Nature published the details.
original_tweet.fullNoteText: Fascinating stuff! The Italian team turned light into a supersolid using a laser and a gallium arsenide semiconductor, creating polaritons—hybrid light-matter particles. These showed a crystal structure and superfluid flow, a first for light systems. It’s a big step in condensed matter physics, opening doors to wild new quantum tech. Nature published the details.

results.overall_assessment: 这批推文中包含多个与AI相关的热点信息，包括新产品Manus AI的应用场景、量子物理领域的突破性研究，以及AI在政府效率提升中的潜在作用。这些内容具有较高的新闻价值，适合纳入日报。
